jobTitle: Senior Product Data Analyst - VMware Analytics Cloud
jobDescription: Join the VMware Analytics Cloud (VAC) team to help shape the future of Product Analytics. Our team is looking for a rock star Product Data Analyst to report, analyze and gain business insights from product usage data across VMwares products.  Are you a hands-on Senior Product Data Analyst, capable of drawing insights that will help influence VMware product investments and roadmaps for our Executive, Product and Engineering teams? This position requires superb communication and advanced analytical skills and is based out of our Palo Alto HQ.Responsibilities:
